languages.text: Крепко сжимая ладонь Вольного Торговца, Кассия вела {mf|его|ее} сквозь бурый туман — прочь из картины. Их обнаружили без сознания в Санктум Навис спустя двадцать терранских дней после исчезновения, как только корабль Вольного Торговца совершил трансляцию из варпа в неизвестной системе.

traits.locale_text: Крепко сжимая ладонь Вольного Торговца, Кассия ведет {mf|его|ее} сквозь бурый туман — прочь из картины. Их находят без сознания в Санктум Навис спустя двадцать терранских дней после исчезновения, как только корабль Вольного Торговца своевольно совершает выход из варпа в неизвестной системе.

languages.text: Cassia took the Rogue Trader's hand and guided {mf|him|her} through the maroon mist and out of the painting. Their unconscious bodies were discovered in the Sanctum Navis 20 Terran days after their disappearance: as soon as the Rogue Trader's voidship had emerged from the warp in an unknown system.
languages.original_text: Крепко сжимая ладонь Вольного Торговца, Кассия вела {mf|его|ее} сквозь бурый туман — прочь из картины. Их обнаружили без сознания в Санктум Навис спустя двадцать терранских дней после исчезновения, как только корабль Вольного Торговца совершил трансляцию из варпа в неизвестной системе.

traits.locale_text: Cassia took the Rogue Trader's hand and guided {mf|him|her} through the maroon mist and out of the painting. Their unconscious bodies were discovered in the Sanctum Navis twenty Terran days after their disappearance — as soon as the voidship had emerged from the warp in an unknown system.

Their unconscious bodies were discovered in the Sanctum Navis 20 Terran days after their disappearance: as soon as the Rogue Trader's voidship had emerged from the warp in an unknown system.

Their unconscious bodies were discovered in the Sanctum Navis 20 Terran days after their disappearance: as soon as the Rogue Trader's voidship had emerged from the warp in an unknown system.

Cassia took the Rogue Trader's hand and guided {mf|him|her} through the maroon mist and out of the painting. Their unconscious bodies were discovered in the Sanctum Navis 20 Terran days after their disappearance: as soon as the Rogue Trader's voidship had emerged from the warp in an unknown system.

languages.text: カシアは自由開拓者の手をとり、{mf|彼|彼女}に導かれて栗色の霧を抜け、絵画から脱出した。意識を失ったふたりの身体がサンクトゥム・ネイヴィスで発見されるまで、失踪、すなわち自由開拓者のヴォイドシップが歪みから未知の星系に出現して20地球日が経過していた。
languages.original_text: Cassia took the Rogue Trader's hand and guided {mf|him|her} through the maroon mist and out of the painting. Their unconscious bodies were discovered in the Sanctum Navis 20 Terran days after their disappearance: as soon as the Rogue Trader's voidship had emerged from the warp in an unknown system.

traits.locale_text: カシアは自由開拓者の手をとり、{mf|彼|彼女}に導かれて栗色の霧を抜け、絵画から脱出した。意識を失ったふたりの身体がサンクトゥム・ネイヴィスで発見されるまで、失踪、すなわち自由開拓者のヴォイドシップが歪みから未知の星系に出現して20地球日が経過していた。

languages.text: 卡西娅握着行商浪人的手，引导{mf|他|她}穿过了红褐色的迷雾，离开了画中世界。行商浪人的虚空舰刚好离开了亚空间，出现在某个未知星系中。此时距行商浪人失踪之日起，已经过了二十个泰拉日。船员们在导航者圣所中找到了昏迷不醒的两人。
languages.original_text: Cassia took the Rogue Trader's hand and guided {mf|him|her} through the maroon mist and out of the painting. Their unconscious bodies were discovered in the Sanctum Navis 20 Terran days after their disappearance: as soon as the Rogue Trader's voidship had emerged from the warp in an unknown system.

traits.locale_text: 卡西娅握着行商浪人的手，引导{mf|他|她}穿过了红褐色的迷雾，离开了画中世界。行商浪人的虚空舰刚好离开了亚空间，出现在某个未知星系中。此时距行商浪人失踪之日起，已经过了二十个泰拉日。船员们在导航者圣所中找到了昏迷不醒的两人。

languages.text: Guidant {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} par la main à travers la brume rouge sombre, Cassia est parvenue à les extirper du tableau. Ils ont été retrouvés inconscients dans le sanctum navis 20 jours de Terra après leur disparition, soit à l'instant même où le vaisseau spatial {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} a émergé du Warp dans un système inconnu.
languages.original_text: Cassia took the Rogue Trader's hand and guided {mf|him|her} through the maroon mist and out of the painting. Their unconscious bodies were discovered in the Sanctum Navis 20 Terran days after their disappearance: as soon as the Rogue Trader's voidship had emerged from the warp in an unknown system.

traits.locale_text: Guidant {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} par la main à travers la brume rouge sombre, Cassia est parvenue à les extirper du tableau. Ils ont été retrouvés inconscients dans le sanctum navis 20 jours de Terra après leur disparition, soit à l'instant même où le vaisseau spatial {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} a émergé du Warp dans un système inconnu.

languages.text: Cassia tomó de la mano {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente y {mf|lo|la} guió a través de la bruma granate hasta el exterior del cuadro. Sus cuerpos inconscientes se hallaron en el Sanctum Navis veinte días terranos después de su desaparición, justo cuando la nave del vacío {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente emergía de la disformidad en un sistema desconocido.
languages.original_text: Cassia took the Rogue Trader's hand and guided {mf|him|her} through the maroon mist and out of the painting. Their unconscious bodies were discovered in the Sanctum Navis 20 Terran days after their disappearance: as soon as the Rogue Trader's voidship had emerged from the warp in an unknown system.

traits.locale_text: Cassia tomó de la mano {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente y {mf|lo|la} guió a través de la bruma granate hasta el exterior del cuadro. Sus cuerpos inconscientes se hallaron en el Sanctum Navis veinte días terranos después de su desaparición, justo cuando la nave del vacío {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente emergía de la disformidad en un sistema desconocido.

languages.text: Cassia nahm {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} bei der Hand führte {mf|ihn|sie} durch den kastanienbraunen Nebel und aus dem Gemälde heraus. Ihre bewusstlosen Körper wurden 20 terranische Tage nach ihrem Verschwinden im Sanctum Navis entdeckt — sobald das Raumschiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} den Warp in einem unbekannten System wieder verlassen hatte.
languages.original_text: Cassia took the Rogue Trader's hand and guided {mf|him|her} through the maroon mist and out of the painting. Their unconscious bodies were discovered in the Sanctum Navis 20 Terran days after their disappearance: as soon as the Rogue Trader's voidship had emerged from the warp in an unknown system.

traits.locale_text: Cassia nahm {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} bei der Hand führte {mf|ihn|sie} durch den kastanienbraunen Nebel und aus dem Gemälde heraus. Ihre bewusstlosen Körper wurden 20 terranische Tage nach ihrem Verschwinden im Sanctum Navis entdeckt — sobald das Raumschiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} den Warp in einem unbekannten System wieder verlassen hatte.

languages.text: Cassia, Hür Tacir'in elinden tuttu ve onunla bordo renkli sisin içinden geçip tablodan çıktı. Baygın vücutları, Hür Tacir'in uçsuz gemisi bilinmeyen bir sistemde öteboyuttan çıkar çıkmaz kayboluşlarının 20. Terra gününde Navis Kutağı'nda keşfedildi.
languages.original_text: Cassia took the Rogue Trader's hand and guided {mf|him|her} through the maroon mist and out of the painting. Their unconscious bodies were discovered in the Sanctum Navis 20 Terran days after their disappearance: as soon as the Rogue Trader's voidship had emerged from the warp in an unknown system.

traits.locale_text: Cassia, Hür Tacir'in elinden tutup onunla bordo renkli sisin içinden geçip tablodan çıktı. Baygın vücutları; Hür Tacir'in uçsuz gemisi bilinmeyen bir sistemde öteboyuttan çıkar çıkmaz kayboluşlarının 20. Terra gününde Navis Kutağı'nda keşfedildi.
